did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: ILR School Western Regional Office Records, 1952-1996

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations (NYSSILR). Western Regional Office

did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Miscellaneous records from the ILR School's Western Regional Office in Buffalo, New York.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of the publication, "Reflections on Progress at Work," and an announcement of ILR Extension courses in Buffalo, New York, offered in March and April 1952.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations
New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations. Western Regional Office

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: ILR School Western Regional Office Records #/4233m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: "Reflections on Progress at Work," 1996; announcement of ILR Extension courses in Buffalo, New York, March-April 1952.
